choices: search your neighbor's houses and see if anybody is home
go to the mall and run around
you know, I've always wanted to drive a firetruck
I've always wanted to play in the highschool while it was empty
1.content:
the sun shines through your blinds and wakes you up. You shoot up quickly. The sun shouldn't be up yet you set your alarm for 6:00! What time is it? you check your alarm and find it unplugged. GREAT! what a way to start your day. You get up and get dressed quickly. No time for a shower you're already late for class. You run down the stairs to the livingroom. "Mom! Why didn't anybody wake m- you stop when you realize the room is empty. You check the kitchen. There are no signs of morning activity. The coffee in the coffee maker has already gone cold. there are no breakfast plates in the sink. Mayby everyone slept late. You check your parent's room. The bed is perfectly made as if it wasn't slept in last night. You rush outside to see if the car is still in the driveway. It seems strangely quiet. At first you don't understand why, but then you realize that there are no cars on the street. how can this be? It's the middle of the day and there is no traffic. You see no neighbors working on their lawns, no joggers, no parents walking with children, nothing!

The town is empty what are you going to do?
1.title: waking up

11.content: you walk over to your nextdoor neighbor's house and knock on the door. There is no answer but the door is unlocked so you decide to go in and check it out. The house was a mess. It looked like someone was searching for something. then you heard thumping in one of the bedrooms. You duck behind the couch as the door opens and three men in black spec ops uniforms walk out, and start streightening out the mess. Who are these people?
11.title: Not Alone!

choices: wait maybe he has important information for you
111.content: "hey! what are you doing here and where are the Johnsons?" you shout. The man in the middle nods to one of the others and he starts walking towards you.
111.title: Who are you?

1111.content: You wait quietly as the man walks up to you. Maybe he can tell you where everyone went. Suddenly the man grabs you and pulls out a syringe. "Hey what are you doing?" you yell. He quietly injects the needle into your arm. "Let me go! LET ME GO!" you yell. Suddenly your vision blurs and you start to feel tired. As you go limp you can feel the man lift you up and place you into something black. as you fade you hear him zip it up and realize it is a body bag! 'Get me out of here..." you say faintly as you pass out of conciousness never to wake up again.
1111.title: not friendly

1112.content: You start to run, but they give chase. You kick the door open and run out to the street. All three of the men are quickly gaining on you. better think of something quick or you're in trouble
1112.title: chased by the strange OPS!

choices: it's a trick wait for them to leave
go out and check to see if they are still here
11121.content: you quickly run to your house, lock the door, and head up the stairs to your room. If you're going to make a stand make it on the home turf. While waiting in your room you hear a click from downstairs. Apparently they have a key to your house. you start to look around for something to use as a weapon. Your baseball bat is right next to your bed on the floor so you quicly grab that. The footsteps of the strange OPS can be heard coming up the stairs. They walk right past your bedroom door and to your parents room. After shuffeling around there for a while they come out and check the hall closet, the bathroom, and finally...head down the stairs? Why didn't they check your room?
11121.title: strange OPS in your house!!!

choices: Meet them behind the door with the baseball bat
111211.content: You sit quickly as you can in the corner of your room, hiding down beside your bed with the bat gripped tightly in your hands. Your terrified and confused, you don't understand any of this. what do they want? you ask yourself. Suddenly, you hear the slam of a door and you jump from the reaction only to realize it was the front door. They were gone. You slowly raise up and walk to the window and look down at the street below. No one. Your mind is racing, your body wants to shut down completely and breathing has become difficult. If I stay in my room, they wont find me, you tell yourself. But deep inside your mind, you know that they already know where to find you and there setting you up. You turn from the window and head to the door, thats when you see it. You stop in mid tracks as you watch in terror, the doorknob slowly turn and you know this might be the end for you...So, you brace yourself as the door slowly starts to open and you.....
111211.title: it's a trick wait for them to leave

choices: wait in your house till this thing blows over
sneak out with your bat and look for help
111212.content: you quietly sneak out of your room bat in hand. There seems to be noone else here. You head downstairs and try to decide what to do. for some reason they must have been unable to see your room.
111212.title: safe for now

choices: Run towards the sound and get the driver's attention
hide and wait to see who it is.
1112122.content: It is now one o clock and you still don't know what's going on. Who are those weird guys in the black uniforms? Where did everybody go? You sneak out your door and take the back road through the city. It's still quiet on the streets. Besides the men in black you have seen no one today. As you walk down the street you hear the grinding sound of gravel under tires. There's a vehicle coming. Maybe whoever it is can help you.
1112122.title: 1:00pm the search for answers begins

choices: maybe they didn't see you hide quickly
you're quite sure they saw you run now
11121221.content: "Hey! Over here help me!" you yell as you run to the street. You stop short when you see the heavily tented black van. The side door slides open and two men in black climb out."Uh oh"
11121221.title: black van of doom

11122.content: as you were running down the road a black van pulled out blocking your path. Five more men in black exited the van and started moving towards you.
11122.title: cornered

choices: Go out of the Safe Room and search the town.
Stay in the Safe Room and wait.
111222.content:
You run up the street, breathing heavily, only just managing to keep ahead of the men (and very possibly women, since you couldn't see their features clearly) racing at you behind you. You had never been much of a runner - that was your sister. She was the one who had gotten all of the awards for track and cross-country.

You mentally shake your head. No. This wasn't the time to think about this. You only had the time to focus on one thing - running.

You see an alleyway materialize up ahead. You feel relief flooding through you, as you know this alleway. You frequented it so many times, you knew every nook and cranny...

...And every hiding place.

You dash into the alleyway, and before they enter the alleyway and can see where you go, you walk through a brick wall.

Or so it would seem to others. But the ivy covering the wall hid something that nobody but select few people in your small town knows of - a hole.

You squeeze through the narrow passageway and walk down it until you reach a large room somewhere inside the building. The thing was, there were no doors or windows inside it. So you were safe - you felt sure that the people pursuing you did not know of this passageway.

As you begin wondering, however, who those people were and WHERE everyone in your town had gone, you noticed something you had not before. There were five other people in the room. You had not noticed them before, caught up in your thoughts.

"What's happening?" You wince when your voice comes out shakily. You hate it when you sound weak.

"How are we supposed to know?" a fellow 17-year-old asks.

You glare at him as you see who it is. It's your worst enemy, Phoenix Black. Even though it was dark out, you could just make out his black hair. And, besides, you'd recognize his voice anywhere.

"Shut up, Phoenix," a girl's voice says. "We don't need any fighting. Not at a time like this."

Your heart leaps. It's Electra Night, your best friend and, unfortunately, Phoenix's twin sister.

"Electra!" you exclaim, grinning. "I'm so glad you're here."

"Ah, December, you know I'd never leave you," she says, and you can here the grin in her voice. "You'd die without me. And, besides, who'd be able to plot evil schemes to get you and Phoenix together?"

You groan. You cannot believe she would still pursue her crazy idea that you and Phoenix should be together when something like this is happening.

"Who else is here?" you ask, in an effort to change the subject.

"Genesis," a small girl's voice speaks out, and you grin delightedly. You're glad that Electra and Phoenix 4-year-old sister made it.

"Gabriel," another voice, one your age, said.

Ah. Of course. Electra's boyfriend.

"Um, and London Ice," a girl who sounded like she was in her twenty's said.

You know London, but only by name and reputation. You know everybody in this town. It's impossible not to, with the town being so small. London just moved there about a year ago from who-knew-where. She wouldn't tell anybody. She never talked much, and was basically a mystery. She didn't fit in with the town, and so the town didn't like her.

But you didn't really know whether you liked her or not. You hadn't even met her until now. You would withhold your judgement until you did know her.

"So, what do we do now?" you ask the group.

"I don't know," Electra answers. "But I really want to know where everyone went. They can't be all gone. We have to find as many people as we can and bring them here. This is the only safe place in town."

You're not sure if this is the best idea. What if you encountered the people chasing you again?

But you know you do have to find whoever you can. Your family could be out there somewhere.

You bite your lip, undecided. What should you do?
111222.title: Safe

112.content:
You really don't like the look of these guys. They look like that evil dude from "The Matrix". If there's anything movies have taught you, it's don't trust strange men in uniforms. Or suits. Or just strange men in general. The men do not talk as they straighten out the living room. This is very weird. You really want to know what's going on, but it looks like you're not going to learn anything from them. All of a sudden, you hear a phone ringing. The oldest looking guy takes out a mobile phone. It's one of those really old-fashioned-size-of-a-brick ones. What a loser. You admire your tiny little phone in your pocket. You even have a funky cover for it. You're so delighted with your phone you almost forget to listen to his conversation.
"Yes?" he answers. "No, we did not find him. There are eight left on this street. Okay, we'll be back soon." He hung up, and turned to the other two weirdos. "Hurry up". They immediately moved faster, and were soon out of your way. You heard their brisk footsteps moving down the street.
Okay, eight left sounded like there were eight people still around. And you were willing to bet that one of them was Aaron Valentine, the guy that lived in this house, and your arch nemesis. It would figure that everyone else in the world would disappear except him. And what do you know, you were right, he suddenly appeared before you.
"What the fuck are you doing in my house?" he said gruffly. He looked like shit. But then, he always looked like shit to you.
"I was looking for some signs of life. In case you haven't noticed, it's like Apocalypse Now around here. Sadly, I've had no luck here either. No human lifeforms reported found."
"Haha, very funny", he said moodily. "Did you see those freaks in uniform?" he asked.
"Yes, what is going on?" you ask.
"I don't know", he said. "All I know is that I woke up and I went to the stop of my stairs and there were these three strange dudes in my house, so I hid in my closet until they left."
"What would you have done if they'd opened your closet?"
"I don't know", Aaron replied. "I don't even know why I hid, to be honest. Just a feeling I got I suppose."
"Me too". Ugh. You did not want to share any of the same feelings with this jerk.
"So you're telling me that everyone has disappeared except you and me? Great". He sounded as overjoyed as you felt.
"Well, the three men said there were eight people on this street not found. So there must be more. I think we should look for them and try to figure out what to do, or even what happened."
Aaron gave you a withering look. "I don't think so. I want to find out if my friend's are okay. I'm heading over to Greg's house right away."
"Don't you think we should stay where we know there are people?" You could feel your blood pressure rising. Why did you have to deal with this asshole today?
"You can, but I sure as hell am not."
"And you expect me to just follow you?"
"I don't expect anything of you. But I don't think I'm ready to go it alone just yet."
"Well, I'm not going to Greg's house with you."
"And I'm not wasting my time looking for people that I don't even care about."
112.title: Dealing With Aaron

1121.content:
You both walked out of the house and headed to Greg's house. wait who is that? where? they're in Greg's garage, oh no it's those same guys that were in your home. shh! we don't want them to hear us.

Quietly you both walked around the garage hoping to spot Greg hiding somewhere in his back yard, but no nothing, and no sign of Greg anywhere. You knew you were going to mess up because you were so shakey and yes it happened.

you fell on the boxes that Greg left full of faucet fixtures. the noise was loud and you could the footfalls of the men in the back. your blood was rushing and your heart was pounding.

You ran and jumped the fence, but as you fled you tripped over Greg's lifeless body.
1121.title: Greg's Body

1122.content: "What is Greg's number Aaron?" you ask pulling out your cell phone. He tells you the number and you dial it. Ringing, ringing, still ringing, click. "Hello" a flat voice answers. Obviously not Greg. You hang up quickly and tell Aaron that Greg has already been taken."You can't know that!" he yells"He could have hid like us!" "Greg's house is all the way across town." you reason "Ben and Tim's house is right across the street and Julie's house is next door. We should check on them first," Just as Aaron was about to give an answer you heard a vehicle pull up in the driveway. "Over here dillweed!" Aaron hissed as he pulled you into the closet and shut the door. "Great idea genius!" you say sarcastically "hide in a closet they'll never find us here!" He whispers back"It worked before, of course I didn't have you in here wheezing loud enough to wake the neighbors." "Hey!" you snap"I don't breathe that loud, you're the one with athsma!" you both got quiet suddenly when the front door opened. there were footsteps in the living room. "I thought you said there were two of them here," a flat voice said. "There were, one of them called the Henson house while we were cleaning up." A beeping sound could be heard. "There are no signs of life in this house" the flat voice stated matter of factly," Come we have to have the whole town empty by twenty three hundred hours," You could hear their footsteps as they left the house. After you were both sure they were gone you walked out of the closet and chose who you were going after first.
1122.title: clear out before 11pm

11221.content: Ben and Tim have been your best friends since kindergarten. You had to know if they were safe, so you and Aaron went across the street first. You rang the front doorbell. A few minutes later Ben, or was it Tim( Even knowing them as long as you have you can't always tell the difference) answered the door. He still looked groggy like you woke him up. "sup mayn" he said,"You can come in, but I'm not to sure about your dog," he said looking at Aaron. "Bite me" Aaron shot back. "Nah, I wouldn't want to get rabies," Ben/Tim/ whoever said."Say man" Ben/Tim said,"Do you know what all those black vans were doing driving up and down our street this morning? They woke me up and I couldn't get back to sleep until about eight." You both look at him stunned. "When was this?" "About 5 this morning I think, funny thing is my clock came unplugged when they drove by my house. I still don't understand why. Ben slept through the whole thing." You looked at his house. It was still in the same messy state it had always been in."None of them pulled up to your house?" you asked. "Nah, they stopped at every other house, but they drove right by ours as if it wasn't here." You told him what you knew about the men in black, and how you and Aaron avoided them. You told him about how your whole house was empty and cleaned exept for your room. It was as if they didn't see it. "What's so special about your room?" Tim(hah I knew it was Tim!) asked."I don't know. I've been trying to figure that out myself." You decide to wake Ben up and go to Julie's. When you get there you knock, but noone answers the door. You open it anyways(hey this is a state of emergency) The livingroom has been cleaned spotless, and everything is streightened out. "Uh oh we're too late." you say, but then you hear the sound of footsteps upstairs. "Who's there?" Julie says. "It's just us." you say,"but something weird is going on." Julie comes down still in her night gown. She looks like she just woke up too. You explain what's happened so far. "How could this be possible?" she asks" How should we know?" Aaron gripes. "Where do we go next?" Tim asks. "We have to get Greg." Aaron says."But I called his house and those guys were there." you say"They were at my house, your house, and Julie's house, and we weren't caught.
11221.title: gathering the troops

112211.content: Everyone agrees to go to Greg's house. When you arrive, Aaron says, "Since he's my friend, I'll go up to the house." You agree at first. Then you decide that the group should stick together. One mistake that is always made in horror flicks is, that they always get seperated. "On second thought Aaron, we should all go. It'll be safer." Aaron flashes an angry look at you but you won't budge. You turn to the group to get their support. They all agree. Everyone walks up to Greg's door. It opens slowly. You all hear an eery creek as the door opens. When it finally opens, you see that the house is in the same condition as the others. You all look around. Greg is nowhere to be found. Aaron slowly starts up the stairs, when he hears a faint voice from the kitchen. Everyone freezes and looks in that direction. The door to the kitchen slowly opens. Your eyes slowly widen. Your heart feels like it is beating out of your chest. You look around and see everyone else seems to feel as you do.
112211.title: Who Is It?

choices: tackle the man guarding the front door
1122112.content:
You are too scared to move as the kitchen door slowly creaks open. A man in a black spec ops uniform steps into the livingroom. To your horror you see Greg tied up, gaged, and laying on the floor in the kitchen. He looks up at Aaron eyes pleading. "looks like we don't have to search for you afterall." The man said calmly, a slight smile formed on his face. You turn to run, but are met at the front door by another man much like the one that came from the kitchen...too much like him. "YOU WON'T GET ME THAT EASILY" Aaron yelled as he bolted up the stairs. The strange op from the kitchen ran up the stairs after him leaving the kitchen door wide open.
This is your chance.
1122112.title: Someone's in the kitchen

112212.content:
Tim sat down to think. Julie was biting her lower lip which meant she had an idea coming on. "I got it." She turned to look at Aaron. They aren't after us, they're after the adults. You need to stay out of sight and let us go look for Greg."

"No way, I'm going too. What do you punks think you're going to do?" Aaron stomped to the door.

"Wait," Ben blocked the door. "She's right. Why did they ignore all of us? Man, we can't let you go."

Aaron snorted and pushing Ben out of the way, walked out the front door.
112212.title: Insight

1122121.content: "I don't have to take this!" Aaron said as he walked out of the house. "If you guys aren't going to help me, I'll go on my own." Suddenly something clicks in your head. "They couldn't be just after the adults. They would have found Aaron when he hid in his closet." The others look at you. "What's your point?" Tim asks looking bored with the whole thing. "They may still come after us. Before anyone had a chance to say anything Aaron screamed for help. You all jumped up and ran to the door. Two men where holding Aaron down while another was giving him a shot. When he calmed down from the shot the zipped him into a body bag and loaded him into a black van, but before they drove off they looked at the house. One of the men nodded to the other two and they headed towards the house.
1122121.title: a little mistake in judgement

choices: The door is kicked in by the men in suits
11221212.content:
"I think I'm going to be sick," Ben mutters seeing that Aaron has just died.

"Hey!" says one of the Matrix wannabes. Time to run. You, Ben, Tim and Julie start to run up the stairs. You go into the master bedroom and hear the door pounding with fists.

"Where do we go? The door isn't going to hold them for very long," Julie points out. She's right. Out the door you hear a very distinct click that you all recognize. The cocking of a gun.

"Duck!" Ben screams. All of you are on your stomachs in an instant and bullets start to shoot overhead. You army crawl on your elbows over to the window and wave your friends along to follow you.

You know there's nothing outside to grab onto but possibly the tree branch because it is a two story house. But what choice do you have?
11221212.title: Duck!

112212121.content:
There is a pause in the shooting. The door is riddled with so many holes they've decided to just step inside. You jump to your feet and open the window. The bad guys are coming closer.

"Come on!" you yell to your friends. You're the first to jump and mirculously you've reached a branch. The branch droops down by you weight. Julie grabs onto your legs, she has just jumped from the window too.

The branch breaks half way down and you fall about four feet. You and Julie are on the ground and you can hear some rustling inside indicating the brothers are going through a struggle. No time to wait for them, keep going. You pull up Julie and urge her to go throug the backyard gate with you. Julie goes to her car and revs the engine that puts and whines at her request for it to start.

You're in the passenger seat beside her tapping the dashboard urging the car to go as the Matrix guys are coming out the front door. Finally the car decides to go and peels away from the curb, heading towards the freeway.
112212121.title: I smell a car chase coming on

choices: Leave the kitten and go to Wal Mart
11222.content:
"Why weren't we detected?" Amilia asks.
"How the hell should I know?" Aron grunts, "Let's go see if Ben and Tim are alright."
"No! I have a friend a few blocks away. What if she's been taken?"
"What makes her so much more special than MY friends?"
"BECAUSE," she snapped,"She's been sick lately, and I want to know if she's alright."
"What ever, let's just get out of here."
They leave through the door and walk down the white sidewalk to Julia's house. Aaron peers through the front door and concludes that the men aren't inside.
"Julia?" Amilia calls, worried, "Julia, are you here?"
They searched upstares and downstairs, but she's no where to be found. Amilia starts to cry.
"I can't believe they took her, she didn't do ANYTHING!"
"You-- it's-- she's-- ugh.. Just stop crying, will ya? It's not getting us anywhere." Aaron said coldly. Then they hear a quiet mewing from underneath a pile of laundry. A small white kitten crawls out.
"Sir Galahad!" Amilia shouts,"This is her kitten, Sir Galahad.' She lifts the kitten into her arms, and he slowly began to pur.
"Well, let's go check my friends' houses now."
"Okay," Amilia sadly replies.
They start to leave, but Amilia is still holding the kitten.
"Don't tell me you're taking that hairball?"
"Yes."
"You're not taking the kitten."
"I'M TAKING THE KITTEN!"
11222.title: Julia?

choices: go to the food court, I'm hungry
run around and break stuff, hey no one's looking
12.content:
You decide to get in your car and go to the mall. The silence of the town was eerie, but it was great to get the best parking spot. The swish of the automatic doors echoed through the empty halls as you entered the mall. "HELLO!" you yelled. It echoed"Echo!" echo echo
this is fun! It seems I have the whole mall to myself. What to do first.
12.title: empty mall

choices: yes walk up and introduce yourself
no I must hide this isn't safe.
121.content: all of the lights in the food court are off. After fumbling around for a while you manage to find the light switch. After the cracling sound stops the lights finally flash on. That's when you hear the singing. It sounds like a kid's voice. Great! You're not alone. The singing stopped. Apparently whoever it is has noticed the light. You see a long shadow with an irregularly shaped head coming from the other side of the hall. It is holding something that could be a club. dare you trust it.
121.title: singing

choices: you know your curious check it out
this thing could be dangerous get out of here
1211.content: you don't care who it is you're too happy to find another person to care.You decide to walk over and introduce yourself. "Hi my name i-WACK before you can finish you are smacked in the side of the face by something flat and metalic. Was that a spatula? The figure jumped the counter of a chinese restaurant. Loud crashing sounds could be heard from the other side of the counter along with excited gibbering.
1211.title: suprise attack with a spatula

choices: shake loose and yell for help
wait quietly and hope he means you no harm
12111.content: you slowly creep up to the counter and peer over trying to stay out of range of any projectiles that may head your way. you see that your asailant is a small boy. you can't tell how old he is, but he can't be any older than 10. He is wearing a wok on his head like a helmet with leather straps runing through the handles and under his chin for support. The thing he hit you with was indeed a spatula. he was wearing a dirty t-shirt,a brown leather backpack, torn jeans ,and was completely barefoot. "WOCAAAH!" he yelled as he grabbed a salt shaker and threw it at the light switch. It hit the switch turning the lights off and landed on the ground. it was sturdy enough that it rolled unbroken to the middle of the room."TISOBA!" he yelled and grabbed you pulling you to the other side of the counter. he pushed you to the ground and covered your mouth with his hand.
12111.title: wok boy

121111.content: you wiggle free of his grasp and yell "HELP! SOMEBODY HELP! THIS KID IS TRYING TO KILL ME!" you hear footsteps from down the hall and see three men in black suits approach the counter of the restaurant you are in. The boy with the wok jumps up and beams one of the men with a spatula, but one of the other men zaps him with a tazer and he falls on the floor twitching and jerking from the shock. Then the other man pulls out a tazer and shocks you. as you fade out of conciousness you feel them injecting a needle into your arm. you know what. I think that little boy was trying to help you. If you weren't both about to die i'd reccomend you apologising to him.
121111.title: maybe you should have kept your mouth shut

121112.content:
you hear footsteps on the other side of the counter. They are getting close to the center of the food court. you sneak a peak over the counter and see three men in black uniforms walking around. One of them ducks down and picks up the salt shaker wok boy threw. You duck back down and hope that they will leave soon. "They're hiding in one of the resaurants," one of the men says in a flat almost completely toneless voice,"Split up and find them," You've gotta get out of here. Whoever these guys are they are out to get you. Why would they be after you? What have you done?
"eem eem," wok boy whispers motioning for you to follow him to the back of the restaurant. Should you follow him, or should you stay put and hope the strange men don't see you?
121112.title: saved by the amazing wok boy

choices: hide and wait for them to leave
1211121.content: you follow the kid and hope he knows where he's going. He grabs your hand "Wocca" he whispers. and walks down a hallway behind the supply room and to the employee exit. Before opening the door he grabs a few bags of frozen food from the freezer shelfs and stuffs them into his backpack. Then quietly...he opens the door. you both tiptoe through the hall only having to stop once to hide as the men walk by. When you're sure they are looking the other way you both crawl out of the food court and head for the exit. Men in black uniforms are standing at each of the four exit doors on the east side, so you tiptoe to the west side. uh oh they're there too. How many of them are there, and who are they? The kid seems to be familiar with them. He knew to get you to hide when they came in. "ome ome' he says pointing to the door. "I know, we'll be out soon" You try to comfort him. should you try to hide in the mall until they give up or rush past one of the men guarding the doors? you have to do something they're looking for you!
1211121.title: trapped like rats

1212.content: you duck behind a potted plant and wait to see who this intruder is. The shadowy figure walks to the center of the room and starts hopping and dancing."wooga hooga oooooga!" he yells as he headbangs to imaginary music. He appears to be a little boy no older than ten. He is wearing a wok on his head like a helmet with a leather strap running through the handles and under his chin. In his right hand he carries a spatula. his clothes and face are extreemely dirty like he hasn't bathed in days. he sniffs the air and suddenly looks in your direction."wobba wobba iggapo!" He yelled as he ran streight for you.
1212.title: the amazing wok boy

choices: Play all of the sweet new demos
Check out the back room, that's were the good stuff is...
122.content: You immeditly head over to the gamestop. The store is small but all of its walls are lined with games, new and old, cheap and expensive, good and bad, even a few that were hard to find elsewhere. The bargain ben in the center of the room is filled to the brim with used games and the counter overlooking it has the latest magazines on display. There are even a few systems hooked up for playing demos of new releases. You simply stand and stare for a moment before looking around...what will you do first?
122.title: Gamestop...all to yourself...

choices: Leave it for now and check out the games
1223.content: You know that they always keep the best new games and equipment in the back for themselves. You walk up to the door only to find it locked. You could try to break into the room, but that could take awhile...
1223.title: You need the silver key to advance

choices: The hairpin breaks off in the lock...
12232.content: Its a good thing you took that lock picking class about 2 years back. You grab a screwdriver and find a hairpin which you can use to pick the lock Fallout 3 style. You begin picking the the lock, its a lot harder then in the game. After about 5 minutes you are just about to give up when...
12232.title: Lockpicking +5

123.content:
Hmmmm what store should you go to? How about Burberry? No, Prada! How about Gucci! Coach! So many places to choose from!! WOW! This could be fantastic. You can't make up your mind so you go the the nearest store which is Gucci. "Hello?" You say shyly.

"Hello." Says your echo. You see a cute dress and pick it up. "Hmmm." You say. "It's my size - why not!" You exclaim as you rush into the dressing room. You look in the mirror after you tried it on. It fits perfect! "Well hello, sexy!" You say to your reflection. You leave the dressing room and wonder back into the store. "Ooooh! Purses!" You say as you rush to the purse area. "This one is so cute." You say as you emptie the compartments of your old purse and put them in the new one.

Now for some shoes...hmmmm. You walk up to some really pretty high heel boots. They match your dress so you try them on in your size. "Hey, I like these." You say as you strut your stuff around the store. "Well," you think. "I guess I should leave now.

You snag a hat as you walk out the door. "I'm such a bad ass!" Now what to do next?
123.title: Shoplifting?  There's no one here!

choices: You look for some kind of tool to "borrow" from one of the shops
You try to drive your car through the wall from the outside
124.content: You head down the hallway where the washrooms are, and locate the door labelled 'Security'. "Just where I remembered it," you say to yourself. (You'll probably be talking to yourself a lot from now on.) You reach for the doorknob. Locked, of course.
124.title: Looking for the intercom

125.content:
You walk into a clothing store. There are many mannequins.

Evil mannequins.

You knock all of them down and run around grabbing all the clothes in the store.

You turn around to see the mannequins. Only, instead of being on the ground, they are back up on their stands. *scary music cue*
125.title: Evil Mannequins

choices: grab the wires on his neck and pull
1252.content:
How can they be standing? I just knocked them down! You walk over and examine the manaquins. On closer inspection you realize that one of them looks like your friend Ben, and another one looks like Julie. As you walk around you see more faces you recognize, but one of the manaquins stops you in your tracks...

It looks just like you! Startled, you push it down and scream. When it hits the ground it starts to move. It stiffly pushes itself back to its feet. "They look great, but I can't get them lifelike without the souls," a raspy voice says from behind you causing you to jump three feet in the air, "So if you don't mind, come with me," You turn to face him. He is an old man. You can't tell how old, but you don't think you've ever seen anyone quite as old as him. One of his eyes has an infared implant, and wires protrude from the top of his skull and lead to his neck. Something tells you he's not friendly
1252.title: may I borrow your soul little one

choices: spot the KFC and decide you're hungry.
kangaroo-jump into a gas station, setting it ablaze.
remember you forgot to brush  your teeth.
find a Gideon's Bible in the glove box.
you realise that you're on the slip road for the airport.
13.content:
There's usually a driver's mate in a fire truck. The cab is too wide for the driver to see right at a junction. The driver's mate shouts,

"Clear, clear, clear!" if it's alright to turn out.

Today it will not matter that there is no-one to be your driver's mate because there are no vehicles on the road. You slip into the plastic pants and braces. The truck smells of rubber and diesel; good manly smells. The crescendo of the engine revving startles you. The power of this beast is intoxicating.

The siren button is labelled clearly. Hey there's even a Braille tag under it. This makes you wonder about the disability employment policy of the fire service. Maybe all firemen read Braille, in case of thick smoke. The siren whoops out as you lurch onto the highway.

"Clear, clear, clear!" you shout as the tyres screech on the slimy asphalt. A straight runway of pale grey stretches out ahead of you; no impediment; just pure speedtrack. Oh shit! It's not automatic. The gear lever doesn't want to shift, the clutch seems too far away, how do you pull the seat forward? You feel your cheeks burning with embarrassment as you chug along the highway at a staccato 30 miles an hour, siren blaring. All dressed up and nowhere to go. Now you know the answer to the familiar question; if a tree falls in the forest and there is no-one there to hear it, does it make a sound? Well you sure blush even when there's no-one there to see you.

The painful experience comes to an end when you...
13.title: All Dressed Up and Nowhere to Go

choices: you find the airport empty as well
you try to radio for help
135.content:
Driving the firetruck had seemed fun at first, the sirens wailing and the horns honking, but then I realized nobody else cared, or was there to care.. Where had everyone gone I thought to myself? My whole town has vanished.. Everything seems normal enough except for the lack of people.
The large sign read "International Airport Ahead". I figured I have already traveled this far so why not go ahead to the airport, it's usually a busy, bustling place, surely someone else will be there.. I can't take this silence anymore..
I flipped the switch, to turn off the siren.. This noise.. isn't fun unless someone can smile and laugh with me.. Ahhh the airport, I see the planes in their hangars and lights are on that one as it's waiting on taxi for takeoff.. There must be people... I sped up feeling relieved.
135.title: you realise that you're on the slip road fo...

choices: go to Wal Mart and search for grub
settle for a hot pocket from the fridge
14.content: your stomach rumbles reminding you that you skipped breakfast. The fridge is nearly empty. where do you want to go to get food?
14.title: Hungry?

142.content: Brother Rizzos is this great pizza place near your house that you go to every chance you get. It's not far so you walk to it. There are no cars in the parking lot which is strange considering that it is lunch time. The doors are unlocked, but the lights are out. There is nobody behind the counter. Your stomach growls reminding you that you are hungry. How hard can it be to make a pizza?
142.title: yoa wanta pizza

144.content: You settle for a Hot Pocket in a fridge. Just when you reach out to grab it, you hear a noise outside. You think it is your mom outside, perhaps working in the garden. What do you do?
144.title: Hot Pockets!

choices: It's time to consult mom about this...
Say nothing and head to your emergency supply of junk food!
1441.content:
Aww, forget mom. Your hungry anyway, and need to get to school.

Just as you went back to grabbing the tasty Hot Pocket, you realize that there is nothing in the refrigerator.

Wait a second-- that's just wrong. Just less than a minute ago, that Hot Pocket was there. All the food was there. And now vanished.

This is creeping you out. Seriously. First the empty street, now an empty refrigerator.

You need to talk to someone about this. Either you are going crazy, or something bad is really happening.
1441.title: But the Food-- Why the FOOD!

choices: back up and slam the door!
14411.content: "Mom! What happened to the foo-?" you stop short when you see the horrid beast in front of you. It resembled a giant rabbit, but it's teeth and claws were far longer and sharper than any rabbit you've ever seen. You could see your terrified face reflected in it's enourmous red eyes. "Hssss!" before you had time to react it lunged for you.
14411.title: YOUR NOT MOM!

choices: grab the nearest weapon and fight
144111.content:
you hear a loud thud as the beast hits the door. You locked the door quickly and ran up the stairs to your room. When you opened the door to your bedroom you saw those horrible red eyes glaring up from under your bed. "HOW DID YOU GET IN HERE?" you yelled. Quicly you slammed the door and blocked it with a chair from your computer room, rushed down the stairs, and stopped short. "Where's the front door?" The wall where the front door was supposed to be was the same smooth flat white wall as the rest of the house. You could hear the clicking of toenails descending the stairs.

What do I do now?
144111.title: no exit

choices: The bunny is already behind you!
The wet rag was actually a towel soaked with grease!
1441112.content:
You are desperate to get out of here; you definitely don't want to be breakfast.

You dash through the dining room and through the kitchen.

After what seemed like a million years, you are finally at the back door.

"Yesss!" you cry happily. "Freedom-- at last!" You turn the doorknob with your hand, and are surprised that it is so slippery.

You look down and see that the doorknob is covered with grease.

Obviously, that rabbit thing does not want you to escape.

You quickly grab a wet rag from the nearby sink and try to wipe off the grease.

What next?
1441112.title: Time Is Running Out

choices: try to open the door quick
try to go out the window
14411121.content: as you scamble to wipe the grease of the doorknob you feel hot air rush against the back of your neck accomanied by the sound of heavy breathing. You turn around and throw the rag in the direction of the breathing. A loud screech fills the room as the greasy rag pegs the beast in the eye.
14411121.title: breathing down your neck

choices: use the doorknob as a weapon
144111211.content: you turned the doorknob with all your might...sadly that was too much for the poor little thing and it broke off. "WHY!" you yel as the rabbit beast of doom regains composure and slowly stalks toward you with hate in it's eyes.
144111211.title: uh oh

1441112111.content: Before you really had time to think about it at all you tightened your grip on the doorknob and smashed it into the side of the rabbit's face. It let out a shriek that shook the house. You almost thought the shriek sounded like your name, but it was probably just your ears playing tricks on you. You shrug off this thought and continue to wail on the bunny creature. It falls dead at your feet with a heavy thud. You walk to the livingroom still stunned by the attack. The door! You see the front door right where it's always been. You need some fresh air so you open the door and step outside. A lawnmower hums in the yard next door. Lawnmower? You turn to see Mr. Henson mowing his lawn like usual. Cars are passing on the streets like any other day. Mrs. Needlemeyer from the house on your left heads towards your front yard(she always was very nosey). That's when you realise you are covered in blood. You can't deal with her right now, so you quickly duck into the house. The bunny creature is gone. Where it used to lay there is a slumped human figure. You are too scared to approach it but you have to know. as you start towards it there is a sharp rap on the door. "Is everything ok in there I heard screaming." Mrs. Needlemeyer's shrewish voice calls.
1441112111.title: snap back

choices: Stay still and hope a miracle happens.
DON't stay still! There's absolutely no way you're gettin' eaten
14411122.content:
You gasp when you finally realize that your attempts to clean the doorknob are useless.

To your dismay, the water-soaked rag was actually a greasy towel!

You turn around to dash towards the nearest window before it would be too late.

Unfortunately, it IS too late. The bunny monster is behind you!

"Ahh!" you cry out in surprise, jumping into a halt.

The monstrous rabbit starts to saunter toward you hungrily, drool dripping onto the floor from its menacing mouth.

What do you do next?
14411122.title: Enter Scary Music Here

144111221.content:
You are too scared to think streight and the growling bunny lunging for you is of no help whatsoever! You freeze in place and close your eyes.


You hear a hissing growl and are knocked to the ground by the heavy bunny beast. Its claws dig into your shoulders pinning you to the ground. you feel warm drops of spittle rain down on your face and can feel his hot breath as he lowers his head to your throat. You try kicking free, but it's like kicking a furry brick wall. You feel a sharp pain like many needles as he sinks his teeth into your jugular vein. Extreme pain erupts through you as he shakes you, then...you feel nothing.
144111221.title: the beast feeds

choices: Temperature in school varies from hot to cold
She hears a hugh truck pull into the driveway
Cafeteria is empty. Noises of pots and pans.
Cheerleaders are coming on PA. From where??
Do I leave here and find another place to search
15.content:
"They've got to be somewhere. People just don't disappear. Things don't stop running."

Maybe they are all at the high school. That's the biggest place where everybody could go. We go there for drills for tornadoes. I have been at school alone when I stayed late to work on the paper or projects. I'm not afraid to go there."

"Just in case, I will keep yelling as I walk there to find some people who know what is going on."

"And I should be able to go online to get help or find out what's going on."

She arrives at the high school. Parking lot is empty. Doors to school are locked. Lights from inside aren't on. She hears no voices.

She frightened but getting angry to discover what's happening. She breaks a window with a heavy rock. On a normal day, it's likely she couldn't pick up that rock, let alone throw it through a window.

She stands on a box and crawls through
15.title: Maybe the high school

151.content: as she carefully crawls through the window trying to avoid the broken glass she feels it getting noticeably colder "What on earth?" she thinks aloud as she opens the door to the main hall. It's even colder here. There is frost on the walls, and it's the middle of May! Curiosity peaked she continues down the hall. The closer she gets to the auditorium the colder it seems to get. now there is ice on the floor, ICE! She slowly and carefully treads on the ice until she gets to the assembly door. the door has a thick layer of ice on it.
151.title: cold? in May?

choices: go out to meet them maybe they can help
hide, maybe they are the ones who did this
1511.content: She had to break the ice on the crack of the door to open it. Icy vapor flooded from the room. When she entered she could barely see her hand in front of her face. "What could me making all of-EEK!" She saw a face directly in front of her and backed up tripping on the floor. "Please don't hurt me," she said in a voice hardly above a whisper. Then she realized that the face wasn't moving. She walked over to the figure. It was a body incased in ice! she brushed the outer layer of frost off for a better view. "STACY!" it was her best friend stacy. She stared in at the figure of her best friend who appeared to be laying down to pleasant dreams, then she saw that Stacy wasn't alone. The walls were lined with frozen people! Some she knew, others were complete strangers. While her mind was trying to process this she heard two female voices from the hall.
1511.title: Frozen horror

choices: run back into the assembly room
try to rush the women and push past them
15111.content: You open the door and run to the voices screaming"PLEASE HELP ME! THEY'VE FROZEN MY FR—" you stop short when you see who the voices belonged to. They looked human, but their skin was extremely white, and their hair and eyes were blue."Don't worry little girl," the one on the right said. We'll make everything ok. They both started walking towards you. Something in their eyes told you that their idea of ok was deffinately not yours.
15111.title: help me!

151111.content: You quicly run back into the assembly room. There's no way they're getting you. They quicly follow. To your horror, when you get to the other doors they are blocked by frozen bodies. When you turn to run back towards the front doors you see two shadows in the vapor. "Gotta keep them fresh," one of them says "Wouldn't want them to spoil before we get back home now would we?" the other says. They are now close enough that you can see their evil smiles. Sadly that's too close. The grab you and lift you off the ground. Their strength is surpising for their build. "Don't worry this won't hurt a bit," they say as they place you into a big machine. Cold air blows on you, and as you try to fight you slowly fall into a deep sleep. "Rest sweet my little tender morsel," Is the last thing you hear before your conciousness fades completely.
151111.title: cornered

151112.content: you rush towards the two strangers. Despite their surprise they act quicly locking their arms red rover style. You could either try to duck under their arms or aim for one of the women.
151112.title: charge

1511122.content: which one? come on make your choice quick!
1511122.title: right or left

choices: they talk her in to putting you with the others
15111221.content: you charge head first right into her stomach. She lets out a loud gasp and doubles over. You push her aside and run for the door. The woman on the left starts to head after you but the one on the right stops her. "Don't worry, she won't get far," she said. As you run down the hall you run face first into someone and fall to the ground. As your vision focuses you see that it is another alien. She has two friends as well. They grab you by the arms and lift you off the ground. You kick and fight, but they are stronger than you and manage to keep a good grip. They take you back to the auditorium where the other two are waiting. "See," one of them said to the other. "The one you head butted earlier walks up and pinches your cheek. "I think I'll keep this one for myself," she says "I'll just count her as a bonus," The one that was with her when you first walked in turned to her " You know we aren't allowed to take any of them for ourselves Zircon," Zircon looked at her sharply, "And who would tell them Beryl? You? That would be just like you. One of the others spoke up, "She's right, If you take one they won't pay you when we get back," Zircon rolled her eyes. "How are they going to find out? It's not like they counted the population, They won't miss one sweet little girl,"
15111221.title: are you going to become Zircon's property?

151112211.content: "They monitor us and you know it!" Beryl shot back. If you eat her they will count that as your fee, they might even take our pay away. "Zircon thought about this for a while. "O, ok. Put her in the freeze chambers." she answered looking very dissapointed. The two carrying you walk you into the room and sit you in a cryosleep chamber. Before you have time to fight cold air blast on you and you fall asleep never to wake up again.
151112211.title: in the chamber

153.content: you hear a clanking sound in the cafeteria. It sounds like pots and pans being dropped. You rush to the kitchen area. Finally, you are not alone! When you open the door you see the pots and pans floating by themselves! They are busily moving around the kitchen. The smell of food is strong in the air, but despite the fact that you haven't eaten since last night the smell repulses you. As you watch cafeteria ladies appear out of thin air. They busily cook the food as if they've always been there. Their sudden appearance startles you and you let out a scream. One of them drops her dishes and the others all turn to face you. All of them exept the one who dropped her dishes flee from the room screaming. The one that stayed behind appears to be frozen in fear.
153.title: freaked out lunch ladies

choices: walk up and hug your mom
1531.content: you walk up to the lunch lady. "Are you ok mam?" you ask. She shrieks and runs from the room. From the other side of the door you can hear the excited voices of the lunch ladies as they tell the others what happened. You can't make out a word of what they're saying due to the fact that they're all talking at once, and speaking really fast. you decide it would be best to go home before there is more trouble. As you walk up to your front door(that's funny you don't even remember the walk from the school) you notice it's getting dark. The porch light and living room light of your house are on. As you enter you can hear your mom crying and your dad trying to comfort her. you close the door quietly so as not to disturb them. "It was a beautiful service," your mom says sobbing into a tissue your dad gave her, "I still can't believe she's gone," That's when you remember, your aunt Sally died last week, but you thought they already went to her funeral. "We'll have to thank your brother for letting us stay at his house last week." your mom says, "I don't know if I could've stood being here after what happened." After what happened? you think to yourself. What are they talking about? "I left the coffee maker on before we left" Dad said,"It's a miracle the house didn't burn down while we were gone," Mom grimaced "I wish it did burn down! I wish that when we came home there was nothing but a pile of ashes!" "Now honey, we'll make it through this. I know it hurts, but we can't just give up on life," Dad consoled.
1531.title: I can't believe she's gone

info.brief_description: you wake up one day to find that your city is empty. you are the only person for miles.
info.description:
you wake up one day and nobody is in your house. You go outside and the streets are empty. You see nobody. it appears the whole town is yours! What will you do.

This can go basically anywhere. It can be comedy horror sci-fi whatever.
have fun and tell me what you think
